channel.title: Best Rare games and the best music in them
channel.description:
Hi. This is my first thread here. So tell me, what were the best Rare games and what was the best music in them?
IMHO as there is only a few of them I nominate Goldeneye 007 and Banjo-Tooie as the best.
As for the music heres some good ones. Please try to include a link to a video that has the music.
Goldeneye 007 Runway level. [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BBqllbA66tQ&feature=related']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BBqllbA66tQ&feature=related[/url]
Donkey Kong 64 Frantic Factory. [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QQceqHynii0']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QQceqHynii0[/url]

item.title: Best Rare games and the best music in them
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
Holy crap. I love this thread. (IMO N64 was the best console, along side the SNES)
Almost every song by Grant Kirkhope, David Wise is in my good books! :]

My Favourites are:
Fungi Forest Daytime - Donkey Kong 64 by Grant Kirkhope
&
Forest Interlude - Donkey Kong Country II by David Wise

:3

Read full topic
